description: Central function of the Griha Pravesh Ceremony of 50,000 PMAY-G houses
Presentation of Block Plans by Programme Officer before DPC by 20th January 2026
Presentation of District Annual Plan and LB to Zilla Parishad by the DPC by 21st January 2026
Approval of District Annual Plan by the Zilla Parishad and submission to the State by 31st January 2026
Submission of Labour Budget to the Central Government by 10th February 2026
